title: Account hacked and recovered
body:
Hello,

So i had my account hacked and it took me month to notice, i got it back since a few days thanks to riot good job.

Unfortunatly, ranking of the season got destroyed by the hacker, my honor went to 0, and my summoner name changed.

I wish all three could be fixed, but i know probably not. But if i could at least got my name back, i would be glad.......

Is this possible ? Thank you

replies.body:
I'm *fairly* certain that the summoner name and the honor may be able to be fixed, but it depends on the situation and they have their reasons for not editing those sometimes. Did the agent close out your ticket? If so, submit another one, saying that your account was compromised and ask them to repair the damage done.

Good luck!

I asked them about it in the ticket, and they never answered, so i guess they closed it.

The best would be a rollback to the moment where my password got changed, but i guess it's not possible since people could fake to be hacked to have honor back and stuff...

As long as we can see proof that the hacker was the one who changed your name, it'd be pretty simple to get that name changed back. If the ticket was closed due to it not being responded to quickly enough, feel free to open it back up or simply shoot us a brand new [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you want!

Well, riot can see that this happened after my PW got changed, and before it got it back. Away from that, i got the tchat with the guy who bought my account as he explain me he thought it was a sold account, and that he changed my name, but once more, i got no proof that this is real, i could have a friend do this for me.

So i don't know if that will be enough, i'll guess i'ill try re open my ticket, thank you for answering

The thing I most doubt a rollback of is the ranked standing - but you never know. I do know they work with people who have legitimately had their accounts hacked to get them back what they had damaged by the hacker - within reason of course.

I'd submit another ticket (or wait for one of the friendly help poros to come take a look at your case)
